divisions.name: Civil Division
divisions.description: Our Civil Division specializes in delivering comprehensive civil engineering solutions, including structural design, construction, and maintenance of industrial facilities. We excel in steel structure fabrication, foundation works, and infrastructure development, ensuring robust and sustainable outcomes for our clients. With extensive experience in the industrial sector, we have successfully collaborated with leading petrochemical and energy companies, providing tailored solutions to meet their complex requirements.

projects.projectname: GCC E & I- FO - CIVIL STEEL STRUCTURE
projects.description: Construction of a robust civil steel structure for enhancing industrial infrastructure.
Implementation of advanced emission control systems to meet environmental standards.
Power factor improvement project to optimize electrical efficiency.
Installation of protective systems for gear boxes in cooling tower operations.
Expansion of substation facilities to support increased power demands.
Replacement of motor pumps to enhance operational efficiency.
Comprehensive civil, structural, mechanical, and electrical/instrumentation works.
Construction of a sulpholane unit for the Addar Chemical Plant.
Development of SAP and effluent treatment plant for chemical processing.
Additional phase of SAP and effluent treatment plant expansion.
Engineering, procurement, and construction of a 115 kV cable network.
Procurement and installation of low-voltage cables for power distribution.
Development of a polo facility for Farabi Petrochemicals.
Second phase of the polo facility development.
Construction of a surfactants and detergents production facility.
Upgrade of power factor systems for improved energy efficiency.
Development of wastewater transfer infrastructure.

projects.projectname: GIS Main Substation Package at MA'ADEN
projects.description: Installation of a GIS main substation for Ma'aden operations.

divisions.name: Electrical Division
divisions.description: Our Electrical Division is dedicated to providing cutting-edge electrical engineering solutions, specializing in the design, installation, and upgrade of power systems, substations, and instrumentation. With a proven track record in the energy and industrial sectors, we deliver reliable and efficient services, including high-voltage substation projects, electrical infrastructure enhancements, and advanced control system upgrades. We partner with industry leaders to ensure compliance with safety and environmental standards, offering tailored solutions for complex electrical challenges.

projects.description: This project involved the installation and commissioning of electrical systems for Saudi Aramco's bulk plants, enhancing fuel storage and distribution capabilities with state-of-the-art safety and control features.
An upgrade to the Emergency Shutdown (ESD) system at Riyadh Refinery, improving operational safety and reliability through modern instrumentation and control enhancements.
A comprehensive upgrade of the Turbine Monitoring System (TMS) across multiple locations, integrating advanced diagnostics to optimize turbine performance and longevity.
Construction and commissioning of a 115 kV substation for Aramco in Khurais, providing robust power distribution for oil and gas operations.
Execution of electrical works for 230 kV and 115 kV substations, enhancing power reliability and capacity for Aramco’s infrastructure in Khurais.

projects.projectname: GCC E & I - FO - CIVIL STEEL STRUCTURE
projects.description: Electrical and instrumentation works for a civil steel structure project, supporting industrial expansion with reliable power and control systems.
Installation of heat tracing cables to maintain optimal temperatures for heavy fuel oil, paraxylene, and benzene processing, ensuring operational efficiency.
Electrical and instrumentation support for the End-of-Day (EOD) plant, enhancing operational control for Aramco Dow’s Sadara facility.
Upgrade of the Distributed Control System (DCS) at Hawiyah Gas Plant, improving automation and process efficiency for gas production.
Modernization of boiler instrumentation systems at Lubref Aramco, enhancing control and monitoring for improved safety and efficiency.
Construction and electrical works for a 115 kV substation and switch yard, strengthening power distribution infrastructure for Aramco GOSP.
Rapid deployment of a 115 kV switch yard to support Aramco’s plant operations, ensuring reliable power switching and distribution.
Upgrade of an existing substation in Rastanura, improving power reliability and capacity with modern electrical components.

projects.projectname: ELECTRICAL WORKS FOR SAUDI ARAMCO TEMPORARY CAMP FACILITY IN AL WASEA
projects.description: Installation of electrical systems for a temporary camp facility in Al Wasea, providing power and lighting solutions for workforce accommodation.

projects.projectname: ASL STABILIZER TANK-B REPLACEMENT AT PUMP STATION-3 IN AL WASEA
projects.description: Replacement of the ASL Stabilizer Tank-B at Pump Station-3, including electrical upgrades to ensure continuous operation and stability.
Enhancement of lighting systems at the MTBE plant, improving visibility and safety for night operations.
Revamping of medium-voltage cables to improve power distribution reliability and reduce downtime at the facility.
Quick instrumentation upgrade to enhance process control and monitoring capabilities at SAFCO SABIC’s facility.
Upgrade of the Vibration Monitoring System (VMS) from model 3300 to 3500, improving equipment health monitoring.
Upgrade of the Vibration Monitoring System (VMS) to enhance machinery diagnostics and reliability at Yanpet SABIC.
Vibration Monitoring System upgrade for GAS SABIC, improving equipment performance monitoring and maintenance scheduling.
Construction of a 115 kV substation for the Crystal Plant, ensuring stable power supply for industrial operations.
Implementation of advanced emission control systems to meet environmental compliance standards for industrial operations.
Power factor improvement project to optimize electrical efficiency and reduce energy losses at ABB-SADAF SABIC.
Installation of protective electrical systems for gear boxes in cooling towers, enhancing equipment durability and performance.
Rapid shutdown and upgrade of rectifiers to restore operational capacity with minimal downtime at ABB SADAF SABIC.
Extension of an existing substation for L&T - SABIC, increasing power capacity to support expanded industrial operations.
Quick instrumentation upgrade to improve process control and safety at SAFCO SABIC’s facility.
Upgrade of rectifiers at SADAF SABIC to enhance power conversion efficiency and reliability.
Upgrade of transformers to improve voltage regulation and power distribution at SADAF SABIC.
Installation of heat tracing systems to maintain optimal temperatures for critical processes at SADAF SABIC.
Upgrade of unit valves in the old DM plant, improving flow control and operational efficiency.
Replacement of motor pumps at SADAF SABIC to enhance fluid handling capacity and reliability.
Construction of a 115 kV substation for AREVA-SEC, supporting sewage treatment plant power needs.
Development of a 380 kV substation for AREVA-SEC, providing high-capacity power distribution for industrial applications.
Instrumentation upgrade for turbines at Qaisumah, improving monitoring and control for power generation.
Upgrade of turbine instrumentation systems in Dammam, enhancing operational efficiency and safety.
Construction of a 32 MW power house for Tasnee-Rowad, providing reliable power generation for industrial facilities.
Temporary rental and installation of a 10 MW power house to meet short-term power demands for Tasnee.
Electrical works for crane systems at ABB, ensuring safe and efficient material handling operations.
Engineering, procurement, and construction of a 115 kV cable system for Farabi Petrochemicals, enhancing power transmission reliability.
Procurement and installation of low-voltage cables to support power distribution at MASA - MARAFIQ.

projects.description: Replacement of low-voltage motor starters and bus bars, including spare parts supply, to enhance system reliability.

projects.description: Installation of fiber optic-based security systems, including cameras and gate access controls, to enhance plant safety.
Electrical upgrade of dredger equipment to improve operational efficiency and reliability at MASA MARAFIQ.

projects.projectname: ELECTRICAL & INSTRUMENT UPGRADE PROJECT IN SEA WATER
projects.description: Upgrade of electrical and instrumentation systems in seawater processing facilities, enhancing performance and corrosion resistance.
Electrical works for a defense complex, providing power infrastructure for critical operations.

projects.projectname: DR. SULAIMAN AL HABIB MEDICAL COMPLEX
projects.description: Electrical infrastructure development for a medical complex, ensuring reliable power for healthcare services, nearing completion.
Power factor improvement project for Eaton, optimizing electrical efficiency and reducing energy costs, nearing completion.

divisions.name: Plant Shutdowns/Turnarounds
divisions.description: We specialize in delivering comprehensive solutions for plant shutdowns and turnarounds, ensuring efficient execution of maintenance, upgrades, and infrastructure optimization for industrial facilities. Our services include structural repairs, equipment replacement, and system enhancements, all designed to minimize downtime and maximize operational reliability. With extensive experience in the petrochemical and energy sectors, we collaborate with industry leaders to manage complex projects under tight schedules, upholding the highest standards of safety and quality. Our proven expertise ensures tailored, dependable solutions that keep your facility performing at its best.

divisions.name: Instrumentation
divisions.description: We provide advanced instrumentation solutions, specializing in the design, installation, and maintenance of precision control systems for industrial facilities. Our expertise encompasses process automation, sensor calibration, and system integration, ensuring optimal performance and reliability. With deep experience in the petrochemical and energy sectors, we partner with industry leaders to deliver tailored instrumentation projects that meet stringent technical and safety standards. Our commitment to quality and innovation drives efficient, dependable outcomes that enhance operational excellence.

divisions.name: Power
divisions.description: We provide advanced Power solutions, specializing in the design, installation, and maintenance of precision control systems for industrial facilities. Our expertise encompasses process automation, sensor calibration, and system integration, ensuring optimal performance and reliability. With deep experience in the petrochemical and energy sectors, we partner with industry leaders to deliver tailored instrumentation projects that meet stringent technical and safety standards. Our commitment to quality and innovation drives efficient, dependable outcomes that enhance operational excellence.

divisions.name: IT Division
divisions.description: We provide advanced Power solutions, specializing in the design, installation, and maintenance of precision control systems for industrial facilities. Our expertise encompasses process automation, sensor calibration, and system integration, ensuring optimal performance and reliability. With deep experience in the petrochemical and energy sectors, we partner with industry leaders to deliver tailored instrumentation projects that meet stringent technical and safety standards. Our commitment to quality and innovation drives efficient, dependable outcomes that enhance operational excellence.

divisions.name: Mechanical Division
divisions.description: The Mechanical Division specializes in comprehensive mechanical engineering solutions, including the design, fabrication, installation, and maintenance of industrial systems and equipment. We excel in delivering high-precision mechanical services for petrochemical plants, refineries, and energy facilities, ensuring durability, efficiency, and compliance with rigorous safety standards. Our experienced team collaborates with industry leaders to execute complex projects, from piping systems to heavy machinery upgrades, driving operational excellence and reliability.

projects.description: Designed and installed a robust sweet water pipeline system for efficient water transfer, enhancing operational reliability at ARAMCO’s Rastanura facility.
Upgraded gear box protection for cooling towers, improving thermal efficiency and equipment longevity for Saudi Kayan’s petrochemical plant in Jubail.
Replaced outdated motor pumps with high-efficiency units, optimizing fluid handling and reducing downtime for SADAF SABIC’s Jubail operations.
Installed specialized hopper windows to enhance material flow control, improving safety and efficiency at SAFCO SABIC’s Jubail facility.
Implemented mechanical upgrades for power factor correction equipment, boosting energy efficiency and system stability at SABIC United’s Jubail plant.
Overhauled mechanical components of cranes for ABB, enhancing lifting capacity and operational safety at their Dammam facility.
Upgraded dredger mechanical systems for improved performance and reliability, supporting MASA MARAFIQ’s marine operations in Jubail.
Executed large-scale mechanical installations for Farabi’s polo project, enhancing petrochemical processing capacity in Yanbu.
Installed and commissioned an asphalt melter for Farabi’s ASU plant, improving material processing efficiency in Yanbu.
Ongoing mechanical fabrication and installation for SDC’s surfactants plant, enhancing production capabilities in Jubail.
Constructing mechanical systems for wastewater transfer, improving environmental compliance for RTR ARAMCO in Ras Tanura.

projects.projectname: GIS Main Substation Package at MA'ADEN
projects.description: Installing mechanical components for MA’ADEN’s GIS substation, ensuring robust infrastructure in Ras Al Khair.
